title: Iron Man 264 pg10 replacement
description:
Earlier today, I uploaded Iron Man 264 stating I edited page 10 of that issue.

A lot of this had to do with how the official digital release depicted what was originally a double page spread in the print version.

The portrait oriented artwork was printed as large as possible, so had to be viewed centerfold style. This doesn't quite work in terms of computer tablet viewing, so the official release awkwardly split that spread across three digital pages.

I took the available artwork at its current resolution and size to create an amenable story flow solution for myself.

What I'm uploading are my source files, working file and flattened JPEG that you can reinsert into issue 264, should you wish.

Just rename the .cbz file to .zip, unarchive and place the JPEG in the folder. Rezip, rename the suffix to .cbz and you have your comic book again.

Let me know what your thoughts are on re-editing and your ideas.
